p: To assess the mitigation potential in the products sector, C transferred from the forest to products was tracked with the Carbon Budget Modelling Framework for Harvested Wood Products (CBMF-HWP) [ 54, 58, 76]. The model estimates emissions of harvested C through the lifecycle of manufactured commodities and includes burning of bioenergy, mill residue use and waste, exports, and post-consumer treatment (landfill and/or waste incineration) (see Additional files 1, 2).
